reviewText: This is a fantastic series.  I have seen them all and each one keeps you wanting more.  The actors are terrific and the story will envelope you in the suspense.  Love and hate the characters.  The setting is in a Spanish village and the period story is historically interesting.
If you like Downton Abbey you may even like this better as better acting, intrigue, plots, and intrigue. I watched it via another provider, and thought it was very good!
Watched on NetFlix seasons 1 + 2. Spoke to Jun in customer service about  a year  go to request  the third season. I want the complete series with english subtitles PlLEASE
Fantastic show! I finished watching it on Netflix (so in love w/the story & characters) and wanted to purchase the whole set here on Amazon, sadly I can't find one w/English subtitles. Please help!

LOVE THIS SERIES!  Julio and Aliicia: best romantic couple of all time.  Season 3 is now on NETFLIX with English Subtitles.  I would like to be able to buy the entire series on Amazon with English Subtitles.
Outstanding series!! Leaves you on the edge I'd your seat and wanting MORE!
Fantastic! Better than Downton Abbey.  Superb acting, mystery, intrigue, romance, plot.  This has it ALL. I am waiting for this to be available in a REGION 1 USA format.
It is an Excelent spanish serie and I highly recomend it.  The plot and all the actors and actreses are very good
